info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 9:17PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of northeastern Phillips, western Daniels and Valley Counties through 1015 PM MST... As of 915 PM MST, Doppler radar and ground-based sensors were tracking an area of precipitation associated with a cold front producing strong winds in Phillips County, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Opheim, Saco, Tampico, Hinsdale, St. Marie, Port Of Opheim, Vandalia, The Bentonite Plant, Frenchman Reservoir, Thoeny, Baylor, Glentana and Larslan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
